content.html:
This may be a new development, I’m experiencing this now after updating and noticed time-jump warnings when running rqt_tf_tree that I did not notice before. Try updating Jon and see if it occurs on your host install.

‌

Also, from the Ignition Clock Topic:

developer@arthur:~/subt_ws$ ign topic -e -t /world/virtual_stix/clock

system {
sec: 1561471949
nsec: 59257700
}
real {
sec: 68
nsec: 818680554
}
sim {
sec: 27
nsec: 664000000
}

system {
sec: 1561471950
nsec: 736992554
}
real {
sec: 335
nsec: 193348396
}
sim {
sec: 310
nsec: 528000000
}

The multiple clock times are coming from Ignition Gazebo.
